summary: Comprehensive testing of Sales Brain AI-powered customer intelligence platform completed. All 27 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI fully functional with successful user registration, login, dashboard, navigation, WhatsApp integration (preview mode), AI chat, conversations, customers, products, orders, settings, and theme toggle.
passed_tests: API Health Check - /api/ returns healthy status
Frontend Dashboard displays stats (customers, conversations, topics, orders, revenue)
Frontend WhatsApp page shows QR code with PREVIEW watermark
Frontend Conversations page displays conversations and messages
Frontend AI Chat integration works (GPT-5.2 via emergentintegrations)
Frontend Customers page with CRUD operations
Frontend Products page with product catalog
Frontend Orders page with orders and tickets tabs
Frontend Settings page with AI configuration
Frontend Navigation between all pages works
critical_code_review_comments: Minor ESLint warnings in ConversationsPage.js, OrdersPage.js, ProductsPage.js about missing useEffect dependencies - not critical but should be addressed for code quality
seed_data_creation: Seed data already exists from previous testing - includes customers (Rahul Sharma, Priya Patel, Amit Kumar, Test Customer), products (iPhone 15 Pro Max, AirPods Pro 2nd Gen, MacBook Air M3, Screen Repair Service), KB articles, and sample conversations
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features working correctly. WhatsApp integration is in PREVIEW MODE (uses simulation instead of real WhatsApp due to Chromium limitations in K8s environment). osTicket integration is MOCKED. Payment Gateway is MOCKED. AI Chat uses GPT-5.2 via emergentintegrations and is working correctly.

mocked_integrations.WhatsApp: Preview mode with simulation - real WhatsApp requires Chromium which cannot run in K8s preview environment
mocked_integrations.osTicket: Mocked - tickets are created locally in MongoDB
mocked_integrations.Payment Gateway: Mocked - payment status is set manually
